Articles.Content:
Nothing too!!

Please, I need a proof that there really!

Like this?

http://i.imgur.com/Jon1R.png

http://i.imgur.com/bOFLH.png

http://i.imgur.com/Rai95.png

Why take this mapsat issue on with the creator when its the users of the mod spoiling all of it for you. Yes the creator made the mod but he probley didnt have the intend of it doing this. Your ruining it for yourselfs by viewing this thread when it warns you of spoilers gosh.....

As well as if you only used mapsat to find Easter eggs. What Easter egg means 'its a surprise'.

Edited October 4, 2012 by Grand Lander

I think I found the Boulder. Was trying to land on Ike and - all of a sudden - crash. A flying rock. I was like WTF?

Similar thing happened to me yesterday, Was hovering above Ike (Ship with ridiculous amount of fuel & Mechjeb) Altitude a little over 9km?

With the intent of trying to spot the boulder.

Instead, while I was admiring how cool Duna looked with the sun in the background,

BOOM.

Crash into something. 3 kerbals dead. Space Debris everywhere.

Which leaves the question, how fast does this thing Move?

Like this?

http://i.imgur.com/Jon1R.png

http://i.imgur.com/bOFLH.png

http://i.imgur.com/Rai95.png

Thanks for all, but it seems something in my copy of the game is not going well. I landed in exactly coords and I found nothing!! :(

Ciao!!

It may just be a glitch with the landscape scattering but has anyone else found the boulder floating stationary ~10m high above the ground on Eve?

(Pictures tomorrow)
For me, it's a puzzle that will end with youtube link to Trololo, or troll face image...

So this Magic Boulder phenomenon does not obey the laws of physics? Do you think it is malevolent, as it seems a number of people have crashed right into it, and that seems highly unlikely unless it purposefully tried to wreck them.

Someone or something what does not obey laws, especially Laws of Physics, will be punished.

*Sending IPBM*

IPBM = Inter Planetary Ballistic Missile

that seems highly unlikely unless it purposefully tried to wreck them.

Looks like the Magic Boulder is sentient.

We got to kill it before it kills all the kerbals!

Why take this mapsat issue on with the creator when its the users of the mod spoiling all of it for you. Yes the creator made the mod but he probley didnt have the intend of it doing this. Your ruining it for yourselfs by viewing this thread when it warns you of spoilers gosh.....

As well as if you only used mapsat to find Easter eggs. What Easter egg means 'its a surprise'.

Oh no, someone enjoys playing the game differently from you. The MapSat data in the .17 Easter Eggs thread is spoiling all of our fun. That must be why there are so many contented, sincere posters... posting in the .17 Easter Eggs thread.
Oh my god! That boulder is an borg cube! Get away from it!
did you know that gods are little green men (kerbals) jk

Oh my god! That boulder is an borg cube! Get away from it!

No, I already said it was a borg PROBE >:c

You are all right.

I have decoded a signal coming from the Boulder:

WE ARE THE BORG. YOU WILL BE ASSIMILATED. RESISTANCE IS FUTILE.
I really thought something would happen when I got a Kerbal on each tower..

I really thought something would happen when I got a Kerbal on each tower..

Thats awesome. and it kinda feels like Superman should pop out or something.... Got that look.

Yeah if nothing else it makes for a cool screenshot

Now to find this magic boulder I guess..

Which leaves the question, how fast does this thing Move?

Maybe its orbit was west instead of east or something. Maybe orbiting in the opposite direction would have let you catch up to it.
Or maybe its orbit defies physics, similar to the Minmus monolith (attached by invisible string to the surface).
I would think someone would have found the boulder's orbit, no? That could help....

I found a face in a crater on Tylo. r/KerbalSpaceProgram thinks it could be Carl Sagan.

http://i.imgur.com/PS8tz.jpg

I'm curious for the co-ordinates

Sooooo, I quickly skimmed through this but didn't see anything on this. A little while ago, I was mapping all the bodies and when I did Duna I got three anomalies. Then for reasons beyond my understanding I deleted all my map data. (don't ask, I don't have an answer). So I'm going back and re-mapping everything (stay with me, I have a point) and when I get to Duna I end up with TWO anomalies! Now, I've verified that the two I ended up with are the pyramid with sound and the face, but I'd never verified the location of the third, by that I mean I've landed near it and EVA'd over to it. So I got to thinking and I think the first time I mapped Duna I was doing it with a 250K orbit, but this time I was doing it with a 150K orbit. Which tells me that the third anomaly is somewhere between those two. I'm thinking this might be the magic boulder? Yesno?

I don't think it has an actual orbit, I sighted it several times near kerbin, at least unless a rock in the distance moving in circles and going up and down randomly is not a possible candidate. Also, I'm positive there was no debris there, it was my first craft in space on the save.

I really thought something would happen when I got a Kerbal on each tower..

I expected polar bears to run out of a jungle

I expected polar bears to run out of a jungle

I hate it when they do that.. it really ruins my picnics..
